title: The Selkie Mist
description: A year has passed since Finn discovered that he is no ordinary boy. Half Selkie and half Finfolk, he is the most powerful clan member in existence and heir to both kingdoms. Along with his dad, he arrives back in Ballintoy, and this time it’s to stay for good. A recent summer storm has wreaked havoc along the coast and an eerie mist has descended upon the area. Strange events are unfolding and Finn finds himself caught up in the chaos as his dad vanishes. His clan need him more than ever before — and they have been warned ...The mists of time have moved alongAnd things are where they don’t belongThe storm has caused the mists to failBe careful if you swim or sail.Finn will have to use all his powers to have any hope of seeing his dad again, and if his gift of foresight is to be believed, he fears it could be his last adventure.Set in present day around the scenic Antrim Coast of Northern Ireland, this story will capture the imagination of both young and old. Some of the lesser known myths and legends of the area are retold and given a new twist. Magic is all around us - you just have to believe!
author: Judith Fullerton
